member.name: ID2D1GdiMetafileSink.ProcessRecord
member.summary: This method is called once for each record stored in a metafile.
member.param: The byte size of the record data.
member.returns: Return true if the record is successfully.

member.name: ID2D1GdiMetafileSink
member.summary: A developer implemented interface that allows a metafile to be replayed.
